info.title: Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts API
info.description: The API for management Dedicated Hosts

get.summary: Allocates a Dedicated host to your account.
get.description: Allocates a Dedicated host to your account.

parameters.name: AutoPlacement
parameters.description: This is enabled by default. This property allows instances to be automatically            placed onto available Dedicated hosts, when you are launching instances without specifying a host ID.

parameters.name: AvailabilityZone
parameters.description: The Availability Zone for the Dedicated hosts.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure idempotency of the request. For more information,            see How to Ensure Idempotency in the             Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud User Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: Specify the instance type that you want your Dedicated hosts to be configured for. When you        specify the instance type, that is the only instance type that you can launch onto that host.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The number of Dedicated hosts you want to allocate to your account with these parameters.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your Dedicated hosts.
get.description: Describes one or more of your Dedicated hosts.

parameters.name: HostId.N
parameters.description: The IDs of the Dedicated hosts. The IDs are used for targeted instance launches.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for the request in a single page. The remaining results can be seen        by sending another request with the returned nextToken value. This value can be between 5 and 500;        if maxResults is given a larger value than 500, you will receive an error. You cannot specify this parameter        and the host IDs parameter in the same request.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token to retrieve the next page of results.

get.summary: Modify the auto-placement setting of a Dedicated host.
get.description: Modify the auto-placement setting of a Dedicated host.

parameters.name: AutoPlacement
parameters.description: Specify whether to enable or disable auto-placement.

parameters.name: HostId.N
parameters.description: The host IDs of the Dedicated hosts you want to modify.

get.summary: Set the instance affinity value for a specific stopped instance and modify the instance tenancy setting.
get.description: Set the instance affinity value for a specific stopped instance and modify the instance tenancy setting.

parameters.name: Affinity
parameters.description: The new affinity setting for the instance.

parameters.name: HostId
parameters.description: The ID of the Dedicated host that the instance will have affinity with.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that you are modifying.

parameters.name: Tenancy
parameters.description: The tenancy of the instance that you are modifying.

get.summary: When you no longer want to use a Dedicated host it can be released.
get.description: When you no longer want to use a Dedicated host it can be released.

parameters.name: HostId.N
parameters.description: The IDs of the Dedicated hosts you want to release.
